headline: Builders FirstSource (BLDR) Is Considered a Good Investment by Brokers: Is That True?
summary: According to the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), one should invest in Builders FirstSource (BLDR). It is debatable whether this highly sought-after metric is effective because Wall Street analysts' recommendations tend to be overly optimistic. Would it be worth investing in the stock?
